message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $90.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you consider that?
I can see you're a persistent negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I can offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $75?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my bottom line. I can offer it to you for $82.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $79.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we've danced around the price enough. I'm willing to meet you at $80, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
